mapper.select: select count(1) from user_friends where status = 2 and ((send_user_id = #{sendUserId} and rec_user_id = #{recUserId}) or (send_user_id = #{recUserId} and rec_user_id = #{sendUserId}))
mapper.insert: insert into user_friends (send_user_id, send_user_name, rec_user_id, rec_user_name, friend_status, send_time, update_time, friend_ip) values (#{sendUserId}, #{sendUserName}, #{recUserId}, #{recUserName}, #{friendStatus}, #{sendTime}, #{updateTime}, #{friendIp})
